definition: Uber, app-based taxi company founded in 2009
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: Uber introduced the ride-hailing model to China.
sentences.chinese: 优步将叫车模式引入了中国。

sentences.english: Uber will continue to operate independently in China.
sentences.chinese: 滴滴出行称，优步将继续在中国独立运营。

sentences.english: Uber's relationship with its drivers could hit its image and its pockets.
sentences.chinese: 优步与司机之间的关系也同样会影响其声誉和利润。

sentences.english: Apple did not invest in Uber instead it went with Didi smart move.
sentences.chinese: 苹果没有投资优步而是投资了滴滴，聪明的举动。

sentences.english: He said the self-driving Uber vehicles do use high-technology tools to assist drivers.
sentences.chinese: 他说，自驾优步车辆使用高科技工具来协助司机。

definition: DiDi, app-based transportation company (abbr. for 滴滴出行[Di1 di1 Chu1 xing2])
Didi Chuxing Technology Co., aka DiDi, app-based transportation company, headquartered in Beijing, founded in 2012
Google, Internet company and search engine

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: Tesla (unit)/Nikola Tesla (1856-1943), Serbian inventor and engineer
Mobike, operator of an app-driven bicycle-rental business in China, established in 2015
to call a cab (by phone)/to request a ride (via an app)

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1
